item.title: 3 Oz. Stainless Steel Gravy Boat
item.description: Bring a refined touch of classic style to the table by serving gravy, sauce or a dressing in this stainless steel gravy boat. A tapered spout allows for consistent, drip-free pours and drizzling of dessert sauces while the ergonomically designed handle makes it easy to hold and carry. Composed of commercial-grade stainless steel, it will resist rust and corrosion and will not chemically react with acidic food, perfect for pairing a raspberry sauce with your New York style cheesecake. A stylish vessel for sweet or savory sauces, the mirror-finish of this gravy boat will add an elegant touch to any table setting or dessert plate.
item.g:product_type: Tabletop > Entertaining > Miscellaneous Entertaining

item.title: 8 Oz. Stainless Steel Gravy Boat
item.description: This sculptural server provides an elegant presentation for your favorite sauces, gravies and dressings. With its 8 ounce capacity and tapered spout, guests can pour chocolate over their dessert. Crafted from commercial-grade stainless steel, it will resist rust and corrosion and will not chemically react with acidic food, perfect for serving citrus-infused vinaigrettes. Designed to pair well with a variety of tableware and linens, the high polished mirror-finish of this gravy boat will elevate any table setting.
item.g:product_type: Tabletop > Entertaining > Miscellaneous Entertaining

item.title: 3 Oz. Stainless Steel Bell Creamer
item.description: Tea for two calls for this petite 3-ounce classic bell creamer.Â Featuring a charming handle that ensures steady pouring and a round, tapered drip-free spout that offers easy and consistent dispensing of cream or milk into your hot beverage of choice, this creamer is essential to any kitchen. Constructed from mirror-finish stainless steel, this bell creamer will resist rust and corrosion. Perfect for tea or an afternoon coffee break, this sleek bell creamer will complement your tabletop presentation.
item.g:product_type: Tabletop > Entertaining > Miscellaneous Entertaining

item.title: 5 Oz. Stainless Steel Bell Creamer

A round, tapered drip-free spout ensures a consistently smooth pour. With its mirror-finished stainless steel construction, this creamer pitcher is rust and corrosion resistant and will not chemically react with acidic food or liquid. item.title: 1 Qt. White BPA-Free PP Round Storage Container with Graduation Markings
item.description: Ideal for the storage and transport of cooked food, this 1-quart round food storage container is essential for anyone who loves to cook. Crafted from translucent polypropylene, it is stain-resistant and can withstand temperatures from -40 degrees Fahrenheit to 160 degrees Fahrenheit. Featuring built-in handles with red color graduations on the outside in liters and quarts for accurate measuring, this container takes the guesswork out of proper portioning. For added convenience, this food storage container is dishwasher safe. Available in multiple sizes, choose the one to suit your kitchen needs. Use the corresponding lid to preserve the freshness of the products you store in this particular container.
item.g:product_type: Homekeeping > Organization and Cleaning > Storage

item.title: Easy Wipe Marker Eraser
item.description: Effectively and easily clean your dry erase boards and chalkboards with this easy wipe eraser. Simply wipe this eraser over markings on a dry erase board or chalkboard to clean the surface and allow space for new signage.
item.g:product_type: Outdoor > Outdoor Entertaining

item.title: 3" Diameter Stainless Steel Sink Strainer with Stopper
item.description: Avoid the pesky task of fishing out soggy, mushy scraps from the sink's drain by using this sink strainer. After washing pots and pans, pick the strainer up by the center to dispose of any debris left behind. Constructed from stainless-steel, this sink strainer will resist rust and corrosion, making it durable enough for everyday use.
item.g:product_type: Homekeeping > Organization and Cleaning > Cleaning Supplies

item.title: White Garnish Cutting Board, 6" x 10" x 1/2"
item.description: Ideal for small kitchen tasks such as chopping fruit or crafting a cocktail garnish, this pristine compact white cutting board is an essential tool for any kitchen. The non-porous material prevents debris from becoming permanently lodged in small cracks and crevices. or on top of the bar, Since this cutting board seamlessly blends into any decor, you can leave it out on top of the bar, or easily store it away under the counter for later use.
item.g:product_type: Cutlery > Cutting Boards

item.title: White Cutting Board Brush
item.description: Ensure superior cleanliness with your plastic cutting boards with our cutting board brush. These compact brushes fit comfortably into the palm of the hand, while the durable nylon bristles reach even the smallest cracks and crevices. Our cutting board brushes can also be used outside of the kitchen to scrub tough surfaces. Available in six different colors, designate a different brush for each surface to prevent cross contamination.

item.title: Stainless Steel Kitchen Shears with Plastic Handles
item.description: Perfect for small-scale cutting chores, these kitchen shears can handle larger tasks such as cutting homemade pizza or trimming the fat off of meat. These kitchen shears are the ultimate multi-tasking tool and can gently snip herbs and spices to preserve the natural essential oils or snip bacon into smaller bits to use for added flavor in meals. These kitchen shears feature a convenient bottle opener and nut cracker to be used beyond cutting tasks. Ergonomically designed, the handle prevents hand fatigue and keeps hands protected while snipping and cutting. One of the most versatile tools around, these kitchen shears can be used to peel and devein shrimp or cut dried pieces of fruit for a flavorful dish.
item.g:product_type: Cutlery > Kitchen Shears
Kitchen Tools > Prep Tools > Food Prep
Kitchen Tools > Prep Tools > Kitchen Shears

item.title: Boar Bristle Flat Pastry/Basting Brush, 1" Width with Plastic Ferrules
item.description: Tackle several cooking and baking tasks with this 1" boar bristle pastry/basting brush. Ideal for basting meats and spreading butter, oil, or glaze on various foods, this brush features a wooden handle for a secure grip and natural, soft, white boar hair bristles that are durable, water-resistant, and molded into a brown plastic ferrule to keep them secure. This brush does a great job of soaking up pan juices and distributing them over the roasting meat. Available in five different sizes, this tool is a must-have for brushing an even layer of richly flavored glazes over foods and butter on dinner rolls. Perfect for holding liquids and coating food evenly, this brush deserves a place in every kitchen drawer.
item.g:product_type: Bakeware > Baking & Pastry Tools
Kitchen Tools > Specialty Tools > Baking & Pastry Tools

item.title: 1-1/2 Oz. Plastic Baster with Rubber Bulb, 7-1/2" Tube
item.description: Great for basting chicken and turkey, this BPA free baster contains a 1.5 ounce capacity for holding liquids. Use this baster to baste long-cooking meats and create a tender and juicy core. Constructed of a flexible rubber bulb with a plastic tube, it creates powerful suction and can separate from the tube for easy cleaning. Measurements are featured on the side of the tube for your convenience. The rubber bulb is comfortable to hold and squeeze at all angles. A highly functional tool, this baster is suitable for a variety of uses that include buttering popcorn, extracting fat from the meatloaf pan after baking, successfully glazing the skin of roasting poultry, and more.
item.g:product_type: Bakeware > Baking & Pastry Tools

item.title: 13" Oil Mop
item.description: Stick this 13" oil mop into your saucepan for better blending. Great for brushing sauce onto meat that you are preparing to serve or oiling your grates, this mop can pick up lots of cooking oils and sauces. Also perfect for cleaning up small oil spills and splatters and maintaining spotless, sparkling surfaces, keep this tool handy to complete the task. Featuring a simple and classic design with a handle constructed out of high quality wood that offers a solid grip for easy handling and control, this oil mop is useful for wiping up various messes in any kitchen.
item.g:product_type: Bakeware > Baking & Pastry Tools
Kitchen Tools > Specialty Tools > Baking & Pastry Tools

item.description: Get to the bottom of a deep bowl without a hassle using this 10 standard white scraper. Featuring a plastic handle that offers a secure and comfortable grip, a bowl-shaped blade for efficient scraping, and a loop on the end that can be hung for easy storage, it serves its purpose in any kitchen. This plastic scraper can be used for a variety of applications including making batters and dressings, stirring in ingredients, and removing excess material from bowls and jars. A great all-purpose spatula, it is offered in three different size options for your convenience.

item.title: 10" Flat Blade Silicone Spatula
item.description: Follow the contours of your bowl and scrape out every bit of cake and brownie batter in addition to sticky dough with this 10 white plastic scraper. An excellent all-purpose tool, its flat blade is perfect for stirring in ingredients or scraping out bowls. Most cake recipes call for scraping down the sides of the bowl, which is exactly what this scraper will do. The flexible flat blade is incredibly effective when it comes to scraping bowls to incorporate ingredients or to transfer the batter into a baking pan In addition to simplifying the process of scraping out bowls, this scraper is ideal for mixing dough and scooping up chopped ingredients from your cutting board. It is also great for other types of mixing, gently folding ingredients into batter, and smoothing batter in a cake pan before baking to ensure even distribution. Offered in three size options, this scraper serves as a handy tool for several cooking and baking needs.
item.g:product_type: Bakeware > Baking & Pastry Tools

item.title: 11" Red Tip Stainless Steel Bar Spoon
item.description: Whether you are mixing cocktails, mixed drinks, juices, milkshakes or even salad dressings, the long bar spoon can complete the task. Use it as a beer spoon to create layered beers or gently stir cocktails. The twisted middle is designed to spin effortlessly in your hand easily mixing mix drinks. This 11" bar spoon is long enough to reach the bottom of a larger tumblers or shakers, making it the ideal tool for when guests want their martinis stirred not shaken.
item.g:product_type: Glassware & Bar > Bar & Wine Tools > Muddlers & Spoons

item.title: 15 Oz. Stainless Steel Bar Shaker Cup
item.description: Shaken or stirred, this sleek 15 ounce stainless steel shaker cup is ideal for creating the perfect martini. Use this shaker cup to mix iced tea, lemonade or ice lattes before serving. The mirror-finish stainless steel construction will resist rust and corrosion, and keep drinks cool before serving. A shiny exterior makes this shaker cup the perfect serving piece at any dinner party.
item.g:product_type: Glassware & Bar > Bar & Wine Tools > Cocktail Shakers

item.title: Stainless Steel Hawthorne Strainer
item.description: A bartenders' favorite, the Hawthorne strainer makes straining and pouring a breeze. The four prongs and flexible spring easily fit various size shaker tins and seamlessly pour cocktails, holding back ice and other remnants. A staple at any bar, the Hawthorne strainer is a must have.
item.g:product_type: Glassware & Bar > Bar & Wine Tools > Strainers

item.title: Chrome Champagne Bottle Stopper
item.description: After popping a bottle of champagne or sparkling wine, preserve the signature bubbles with this champagne stopper. The chrome-coated steel stopper features a silicone seal that extends the life of the champagne after it has been opened. Simply insert the plastic cork into the open bottle of champagne and press the arms down to create an airtight seal, preserving the festive fizz. Keep champagne fresh from tonight for tomorrow's mimosa.
item.g:product_type: Glassware & Bar > Bar & Wine Tools > Bottle Openers & Accessories

item.title: 4" Nickel Plated Can Tapper / Bottle Opener
item.description: Even the simplest of tasks require the proper tools. This durable church key can opener is double sided to perform multiple tasks. Use the triangular end to puncture openings in the flat top of canned fruits, vegetables and juices to easily drain out the liquid. The opposite end features a cap lifter, perfect for cracking open chilled beers and old-fashioned soda bottles. The nickel-plated construction resist rust and corrosion. With its thin, lightweight design, keep one in your kitchen drawer for convenience or stash it into your pocket to take it on the go.
item.g:product_type: Glassware & Bar > Bar & Wine Tools > Bottle Openers & Accessories

item.title: Stainless Steel Flat Bottle Opener
item.description: A bartender's best friend, this stainless steel flat bottle opener is simple and easy to use. Keep one stocked for outside barbeques to quickly pop off bottle caps for guests. This flat bottle opener also features a thumb hole to pull bottles out of ice without having to stick your hand in it and doubles as a hanging loop. Whether it is for craft brews or old fashioned soda, anyone can easily pry metal caps off of the bottle with the flat bottle opener.
item.g:product_type: Glassware & Bar > Bar & Wine Tools > Bottle Openers & Accessories

item.title: Stainless Steel Flat Bottle Opener with Blue Grip Coating
item.description: The simple design of the flat bottle opener is highly functionally. Use the letterbox end to effortlessly pop off bottle caps while the opposite end comes equipped with a thumb hole to quickly pull bottles out of ice. The PVC coating adds a comfortable grip and makes it easier to spot when it becomes lost amongst flatware and other utensils. With its slim design, it is easy to be the one always prepared, just slip the flat bottle opener into your pocket or bag and take it take to parties to have on hand.
item.g:product_type: Glassware & Bar > Bar & Wine Tools > Bottle Openers & Accessories
